audioText: Chaque fois qu'il commençait un projet de bricolage, il mettait tous ses outils sur une grande bâche pour ne rien perdre. C'était sa façon de rester organisé.
question: What did he do with his tools before starting a DIY project?
options: He would put them all on a large tarp
He would lend them to his neighbor
explanation: The sentence uses 'mettait', the imparfait tense of 'mettre', to describe a habitual action. He used to put his tools on a tarp to stay organized.
